en.title: FusionExcel Sponsored Chef wins Super Gold Medal at 6th World Championship Chinese Cuisine, Beijing, China!
en.content:
Shiva With His Super Gold
Winning Dishes.
Shiva With His Super Gold
Medals and Trophy.
Shiva With World Famous TV
Chef, "Yan Can Cook".

FusionExcel International sponsored a Malaysian participant to the 6th World Championship of Chinese Cuisine held on the 18th October, 2008 in Beijing, China.

FusionExcel would like to extend our heartiest congratulation to Mr. P. Shiva Kumar, a Malaysian Indian Chef for winning the highest coveted Super Gold Award. He commented after wearing our Quantum Pendant, he is more focus and have more energy to perform his tasks. He felt more relax and this enable him to perform better during the world class cooking competition.

FusionExcel is proud to sponsor a total of RM 10,000.00 in cash and Quantum Science Products for him to compete in the prestigious 6th World Championship of Chinese Cuisine Competition. Malaysian Bole
